籤詩版本二:
Umkhomo uhlala ungashintshiwe futhi ugade umfula, awukwazi ukukhuphuka futhi uthembele phezulu.
Izinguquko ezingajwayelekile esikhathini esizayo, u-Xu Jun weqa phezu kwesango likadrako
詩意:
Le hexagram ibonisa isithombe esingashintshiwe somkhomo.
Yiba nesineke kukho konke futhi ulinde isikhathi.
解曰: Kufanele ukubekezelele. Yiba nesineke futhi ubekezele. Kufanele ulinde kuze kufike isikhathi. Udumo lusekhona.
籤詩故事一:
◇Su Qin Bu Di
Phakathi Nenkathi Yamazwe Alwayo, u-Su Qin, ongowokuzalwa eLuoyang, wayekhulekela uGu Guzi njengothisha wakhe.
U-Su Qin wacela iNkosi yaseQin futhi wabhala izikhathi eziyishumi nambili, kodwa iNkosi yaseQin ayizange iyamukele ingxabano yakhe. Wathi ebuyela ekhaya ijazi lakhe loboya selidabukile waphelelwa yimali, wafika emnyango ebhocobele umkakhe wangamnaka nodadewabo akamphekanga.
USu Qin wayenamahloni futhi ethukuthele, ngakho wathola i-Taigong Yin Fu (incwadi yobuciko bempi) futhi wayifunda ngokucasuka. Lapho uzizwa udidekile futhi uvilapha, vele uhlabe ithanga lakho nge-awl futhi ufunde futhi lapho kubuhlungu.
Kamuva, inkolelo-mbono kaHe Cong (He Zong) yasetshenziswa ukuhlanganisa amazwe ayisithupha ngokumelene neQin. Wanxenxa inkosi uZhao futhi waba undunankulu wamazwe ayisithupha.
聖意: Angikhululekile ekhaya, ngisafuna ukufuna umcebo, amashwa, ukuthengiselana, umshado unzima, uLiujia uyisibusiso kwabahamba ngezinyawo, amasimu aphephile, iminyundu mihle, izilwane eziyisithupha azithandi, abantu abalahlekile, amacala omphakathi nokufuduka, balahlekile. izinto, izifo zaseningizimu-mpumalanga, ukuthandazela ukuvikelwa, izintaba namathuna.
